lines.text: It was easy. I am Fang.
I'm sorry, my friend. In one hour you die... but I not let you die alone. I come watch.

[Sarcastically]
Thanks, that'll be a big help.
You've killed thousands of people.
Too many people in China. I kill only man - only bad man. When I kill bad man, I feel good. I have did good deed.
And who decides whether a man is good or bad?
I do, I am Fang!
You come here buy interest in oil field?
I offered him fifty thousand dollars for a quarter interest.
You got that money here?
Well, of course not. I never carry that amount with me.
Please not to lie. Do business China oil fields always cash.

[to Galt, intending to refer to him as a 'loan shark']
Mr. Loan Fish?
You mean me, General?
You got my pen note... fifty thousand dollar?
Right here.
You see, you got fifty thousand dollar I want.
I won't submit to being robbed. My government...

[Interrupting]
I not rob. You give; I take. Give!
This your woman I got here?
I don't know, but I'm interested.
Is all right. I give her back to you. What one woman between friends?
Sorry to cause you this trouble. We have found the murderer.
[Suspect has been lead outside]
I'm certainly glad you found him.
What are you going to do with him?

[Laconically after the sound of firing squad report]
They're gonna bury him.
Fang calls himself the White Tiger of the North.
Fang is a plague of locusts to the North. And like the locusts, he can only be fought with fire. Fang's days are numbered.

[Eying up the two women prisoners]
Ah, only two women! Too bad!
[Indicating Lola]
This one not so good.
What's the matter with me?
Hair like straw; eye like fog; have wide mouth of fish.
Well, you're no geranium yourself!
[Fang and Cheng take offense. Cheng pulls out his pistol]

[Introducing himself to the Westerners in the room]
How you do? I am Fang. I speak most dang bad English. I think I make you understand.
We understand, General. We are your prisoners.
No, I your guest! But please not to leave the town. Tis not nice - make Fang mad.
I am good businessman, Mr. Cheng?
You are the grandfather of wisdom, Excellency.

[about his meteoric rise in rank]
But how did you manage it so quickly?
One day the captain is killed... I become captain. Next day the major... I am major. By and by the colonel... I become colonel. I kill the general myself.
And now you're a warlord.
Ah, is great life!
I had wish take - taken woman. Shouvenir. You like go with me?
No, thank you.
I make you very happy.
I'm afraid I couldn't stand so much happiness.
I am Fang.
I'm Lola!
Alright. I don't want you anyhow. Not like woman who is tough guy.
You tell General Fang that I'd like to speak to him at once. You sabe?
It isn't necessary to speak pidgin English. I speak the language quite as fluently as you do.
You tell General Fang I'd like to see him at once.
Impossible. The General is entertaining Mrs.Creed.
[brandishes gun]
I'd advise you to move on. Please.
Those men were just as worried as I was. Anything could happen in China!
You could tell this was a white man's mule train; but, I had no idea I'd find you people in it. How are you Lola? You're looking fit.
So are you Jim.
Friends, I welcome you all to the Mission. But, I'm afraid these poor walls won't be much protection against Fang and his soldiers.
Fang is a blood-thirsty devil!
I've been laughing at devils all my life. Come with me and I'll show you where you're to sleep. Your rooms may not be comfortable, but they'll be clean. At least there'll be no vermin in them.
Not until the bandits get here.
That's a jolly thought!
We have a number of men here. Why don't we do something to defend the place?
You can't fight China, Mr. Creed.

[Kung Nui says something to her in Chinese]
What did he say about me?
He gave you a name, that's all - small dragon.
Well, tell him I've got a name for him too.

[Jane Creed Enters]
Ganbei. Tell the lady what that mean, Mr. Cheng.
Ganbei means bottoms up.
I drink to you always. Bottoms up!
Come, we take walk. Come! How old you are?
Twenty-three.
Oh! Too bad. That most dang old.
How you like go campaign with me?
You wouldn't want me, I'm married.
Alright. I take your husband.
Not nice Mission lady kill man. Why you not turn other cheek?
Maybe that's because I'm only an apprentice missionary. I assure you, I won't hesitate to shoot you!
He is me! I am him.
Come, we drink. Ganbei, to me!
To you?
Of course, I am Fang.
She has husband - who is bad man. She want my friend - who is good man. But, no take him? Very strange. My friend, you got plenty trouble.
Plenty!
Fang number one man this province.
Most unfortunate situation.
How you get Captain Nui double cross me?
Well, you can do almost anything with money. You know that, General.
Wisdom fall from your lip.
General, let's get back to business. You know, you and I could make a much better deal than I made with Captain Nui.
You mean you double cross him too?
Why not? You're in this racket to make money, aren't you?
You very smart man. My friend, I give you most best deal anyone. You go leave here now and it not cost no money.
What's the catch?
There's no catch. It's easy. I just go kill you.
You must be joking General.
Do I look like joker? Do Mr. Cheng look like joker?
General, what would you gain by doing this?
Alive you no good. Dead you very good. Make two people happy.
You mean you want to kill me so that my wife can marry Hallet?
It best way I think.
I've seen man not fight for his money. I've seen man not fight for his life. Not before, have seen man not fight for his woman.
But, General, if its money you want, why, I'll give you plenty of money. Anything that you want.
It's not I no want money. It's that I no want you. I do this myself Mr. Cheng.
Well, at least fight fair. You both have guns, give me a chance.
But if I give you gun, you maybe shoot me! You t'ink I am dang fool?
General, now, don't let them do this to him. There must be something you can do to save him!
It make me very sad.
If it's money you want, I'll make my father give you every dollar he has.
Oh, so you love this Jim too? Hmm, two women love him. Must be very good man.
Your servant cause plenty trouble for me. But, is alright. I am Fang.
How many times I got to kill you Mr. Creed?
I let you die with me. What more you want?
So sorry, it is necessary for all foreign women to leave as soon as possible.
Very well. These two ladies are leaving in the morning.
How much you weigh?
I don't think that's any of your business gentlemen.
Alright. I no care.
You come with me, I give you beautiful, swell time. And you gain happiness you. Not so dang bad for me too. Well, what you say? You know, if I want, is easy take you.
You wouldn't dare do that.
Oh, yes. I most dang daring man in China.
